tool_description: Extracts structured metadata fields from legal documents including dates, parties, case numbers, attorney information, and other legal-specific data points using pattern recognition and natural language processing.

document_text.description: Full text content of the document for metadata extraction

document_type.description: Document category to guide field extraction strategy

extraction_fields.description: Specific metadata fields to extract from the document

case_context.description: Case name or number to provide context for extraction accuracy

date_range_start.description: Earliest expected date in ISO format for validation

date_range_end.description: Latest expected date in ISO format for validation

party_names.description: Known party names to improve extraction accuracy

extract_relationships.description: Whether to identify relationships between extracted entities

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score (0-100) for field extraction

max_field_length.description: Maximum character length for extracted field values

include_coordinates.description: Whether to include text position coordinates in results

custom_patterns.description: Custom regex patterns for specialized field extraction

error_messages: Document text insufficient: Document text must contain at least 100 characters for meaningful metadata extraction.
Invalid document type: Document type must be a non-empty string that matches supported categories.
Extraction fields invalid: All items in extraction_fields must be supported field types. Check the field names.
Date range invalid: date_range_start must be earlier than date_range_end, and both must be valid ISO date strings.
Confidence threshold out of range: confidence_threshold must be between 0 and 100.
Max field length invalid: max_field_length must be between 50 and 2000 characters.
Custom patterns error: One or more custom_patterns contain invalid regex syntax. Verify pattern formatting.
usage: Provide document_text and document_type for extraction. Customize extraction_fields to focus on specific metadata, add case_context and party_names for better accuracy, set date_range constraints for validation, and configure confidence_threshold and other options as needed.

extracted_fields.description: List of field names that were successfully extracted

field_values.description: Corresponding values for each extracted field

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores (0-100) for each extracted field

extraction_summary.description: Brief summary of the extraction results and quality

unmatched_patterns.description: Custom patterns that did not find matches in the document
